hero.title: IPO Mapping
hero.description: Comprehensive mapping to understand your company's position and readiness for the IPO process, identifying areas for improvement and establishing the foundation for your IPO strategy.

objectives.title: Purpose of IPO Mapping
objectives.description: Our comprehensive mapping process serves three critical objectives to ensure your IPO success.

items.title: Understand Company Position
items.description: Comprehensive analysis of the company's current position and overall readiness for IPO process.

items.title: Identify Improvement Areas
items.description: Detailed identification of areas that need enhancement before going public to meet regulatory standards.

items.title: Strategic Foundation
items.description: Establish the foundation for IPO strategy development and consultant/underwriter selection process.

components.title: Key Areas of Assessment
components.description: Our comprehensive evaluation covers all critical aspects of your business to ensure IPO readiness.

items.title: Organizational Structure
items: Review organizational structure clarity and functionality
Evaluate management roles and responsibilities
Assess Good Corporate Governance (GCG) compliance

items.title: Business Process
items: Map core business workflow: production, distribution, sales, services
Identify manual or undocumented processes
Evaluate business process scalability post-IPO

items.title: Legal & Compliance
items: Legal audit: asset ownership, permits, contracts, dispute potential
Compliance with capital market regulations
Legal and administrative document preparation

items.title: Financial Readiness
items: Review 3-5 years financial reports
Identify capital structure, debt, and cash flow
Evaluate accounting systems and financial reporting (PSAK/IFRS compliance)

items.title: Operational Capability
items: Assess HR, technology, information systems, and supply chain capabilities
Evaluate operational efficiency and modernization needs

items.title: SWOT Analysis
items: Strengths: superior technology, large market share
Weaknesses: dependency on single supplier
Opportunities: supportive market trends
Threats: new regulations or major competitors

process.title: IPO Mapping Process Flow
process.description: Systematic approach typically conducted by IPO consultants or internal teams.

steps.title: Kick-Off Meeting
steps.description: Initial stakeholder alignment and project scope definition

steps.title: Data Collection
steps.description: Comprehensive data gathering from all business units

steps.title: Internal Stakeholder Interviews
steps.description: In-depth discussions with key management personnel

steps.title: Internal Analysis & Audit
steps.description: Detailed assessment of all business aspects

steps.title: SWOT Analysis & Gap Analysis
steps.description: Strategic analysis and identification of improvement areas

steps.title: Mapping Report Preparation
steps.description: Comprehensive documentation of findings and recommendations

items.title: Mapping Report Document
items.description: Comprehensive findings and in-depth analysis documentation

items.title: IPO Roadmap
items.description: Strategic action plan based on mapping results

items.title: Gap Analysis
items.description: List of improvement requirements before IPO

benefits.title: Long-term Benefits of Mapping
items: Avoid regulatory and technical obstacles during IPO process
Accelerate document preparation and audit processes
Build investor confidence and credibility

cta.title: Ready to Begin Your IPO Mapping?
cta.description: Start your IPO journey with comprehensive mapping and assessment. Our experts will guide you through every step of the process.

processCta.title: Ready to Start Your IPO Mapping Journey?
processCta.description: Let our experts guide you through the comprehensive mapping process.
